page.title: 19KINGMOOR EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {KINGMOOR EMPLOYMENT We carried out a survey of all the 10 & 11 year old children in Kingmoor Junior School to find out what their mums & dads did for a living. Most of the working mums in the Lowry HiII area worked in shops. Most dads were managers of one sort or another. One mum worked as a lolly pop lady. (She helps children across the road before and after school). Another mum was a creche assistant. One dad was a medical doctor & another worked in a bank.All dads were employed.About three quarters of the mums had jobs. Nearly all working mums & dads worked in Carlisle city.
